alert.note: Alert for Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 27 at 2:22AM PST until December 27 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Wind gusts as high as 35 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow especially near the Nevada border. * WHERE...Malheur County zone. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow will cause reductions in visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
